description: Didn't even open game, I'll try it out it looks cool.
it is cool but it needs more levels. there is not much to do when you finish them all. other than that, great game.

This game is actually pretty good but it seems lie there's a problem, the game seems not to save any progress that I worked hard to make. It's just frustrating, other than that the game is just fine and really interesting to play, totally recommended from me
